name: df-rngc
body: |- wceq(crngc, cmpt(s0, universe, co(cfv(cestrc, cv(s0)), cresc, cres(crngh, cxp(cin(cv(s0), crng), cin(cv(s0), crng))))))
comment: Definition of the category Rng, relativized to a subset ` u ` . This is the category of all non-unital rings in ` u ` and homomorphisms between these rings. Generally, we will take ` u ` to be a weak universe or Grothendieck universe, because these sets have closure properties as good as the real thing. (Contributed by AV, 27-Feb-2020.) (Revised by AV, 8-Mar-2020.)
